accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.tooltip: Manifold uses different user accounts on your system to run multiple instances of Steam, here you can create new ones or edit your existing ones.
accounts.multiple_accs: There are multiple Steam accounts available for this user
accounts.no_steam_acc_tip: If Manifold can't detect your Steam account, this may mean your user doesn't have the apropiate permissions over this user folder

create.no_passwd: This account won't have a password assigned, your profile will be able to access every file from this user's folder.
create.folder_tip: The user's folder will be created in: {{folder}}

delete.title: Delete user
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this user?
